title: Pregnant Jenna Dewan drapes bump in festive orange dress ...after book excerpt reveals divorce agony
text:
Jenna Dewan draped her baby bump in a festive orange dress while out in New York on Wednesday.

The 38-year-old, who is expecting by her actor beau Steve Kazee, teamed her outfit with a pair of burnt-orange high-heeled boots.

She accentuated her screen siren features with makeup including a slick of bright crimson lipstick.

Baby on board: Jenna Dewan had draped her bump in a festive orange dress when she was glimpsed out in New York this Wednesday

Jenna and Steve became an item in the second half of last year and went public with their pregnancy last month.

The Hollywood hot couple gushed to People: 'We are beyond overjoyed and couldn’t be happier to be expanding our family!'

Although this is Steve's first child, Jenna shares a six-year-old daughter called Everly with her ex-husband Channing Tatum.

Jenna and Channing met while filming their 2006 dance drama film Step Up and they were married from 2008 until they separated last year.

Feeling fab: The 38-year-old World Of Dance hostess teamed her flowing outfit with a pair of burnt-orange high-heeled boots

The former couple were publicly amicable about their breakup but in a new E! News excerpt of her upcoming book she revealed the 'pain' of the split.

'In the beginning of my separation, it felt as though I were in a dark closet, desperately trying to find the light or the way out,' she wrote.

In Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday, Jenna also recalled finding out about Channing's current romance with Bang Bang singer Jessie J.

All dolled up: Jenna accentuated her unmistakable features with makeup including a slick of bright crimson lipstick for her day out

'I was learning things about my ex most people wouldn't have to face - and over the internet, as it was happening. There I was, on a plane, alone, finding out about his new relationship. I felt blindsided. Choosing grace as I learned everything about my personal situation along with the rest of the world was really difficult,' she shared.

Jenna had nothing but warm words for Steve, however, writing in the book: 'When I was ready, I started dating someone amazing.'

She dished: 'It was this cosmically great thing where we circled back around each other after a moment of instant recognition years ago.'
description: She is pregnant by her beau Steve Kazee. And Jenna Dewan had draped her bump in a festive orange dress when she was glimpsed out in New York this Wednesday.
